question:
You have been assigned to give a networking presentation with your colleague from a different office, who you met last year.
Write a letter to your colleague. In your letter:
•	Inform your colleague that you will be working together
•	Provide your initial ideas on the networking presentation
•	Ask for a time to meet and practice the presentation
text: I am writing this letter regarding the networking presentation assigned to us. I want to remind you, I met you last year seminar "Artificial Intelligence" organized by the company.

I feel privilege to work with you on this topic as you have a expertise in this field. Therefore, I have decided some ideas for this topic. First of all, we need to gather all the vital information regarding our task. Apart from it, we should keep ourselves vacant for one hour after the office time as we need to practice a lot to give our best. In the end, we will distribute the topics according to our convenience, which will reduce the burden on a particular person shoulder.

Please suggest me timings, so that we can cope up with the activities assigned to us. I would be free on weekend besides this we can practice during weekdays but I will be available only on alternative days starting from Monday. If possible let's tomorrow for further discussions.
I look forward  to hearing  from you soon.

error_list.error_des: The abbreviated title Mr. seems to be punctuated incorrectly. Consider changing the punctuation.
It appears that the noun privilege is not preceded by the correct article. Consider changing the article.
It appears that your sentence or clause uses an incorrect form of the verb privilege. Consider changing it.
It seems that there is an article usage problem here.
It seems that preposition use may be incorrect here.
